name: Jsgame
tagline: My random project for making a game in javascript and html5
body:
# A Random Weekend Project

After watching the Indie Game: The Movie I wanted to mess around with making a small game. It's something that I wanted to play with for some while. 

This project is about the game that I will be developing.

I am using Javascript, html5 and the the library [Phaser](http://phaser.io/).

I am running this all on my Raspberry Pi with Node.js check out my post ([Random Weekend Project](http://scottduke.github.io/posts/2014/08/17/Random-Weekend-Project/)).

I will be carrying on with this when ever I get a free moment.

Idea of the game.

2D survival shooter. No not survival against zombies but against "humans" with weapons.
Other features that I hope to build in:

* random generated map
* harder enemies
* cover
* weapon drops
* cover will be become weakened if it takes a lot of damage.
* no health re-gen
* maybe health drops.
